Home.servicesBoxDescription: Hidden among centuries-old plane trees and a fluffy carpet of freshly mowed grass, the Enchanted Garden is the touch of magic that will transform your event into a unique and unparalleled celebration of the senses. Just 20 km from Sofia, the location combines the conveniences of the big city with a cozy, picturesque atmosphere under the stars.
Home.servicesWeddingsDescription: Unique outdoor atmosphere, covered restaurant area, boutique apartment for preparation.
Home.servicesTeambuildingDescription: Remote office or team building among majestic plane trees, forest freshness, and a fairy-tale setting.
Home.servicesPartiesDescription: The occasion does not matter - The Enchanted Garden is wide open and ready to embrace a private party.
